ui

Class WorldView

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.WorldView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class WorldView
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Observer
    Very simple prototype view. Observes and (minimally) reports updates in a World. Can be run standalone or with external controllers.
    Author:
    Nazanin
